name: market for airport | airport | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8002/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'airport', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is delivering the service of construction, maintenance and land use and the decommission of an entire airport infrastructure. The service is based on the airport of Zurich. It includes material consumption (concrete, gravel and reinforcing steel), energy consumption (electricity, natural gas, light fuel oil, diesel and petrol), excavation, infrastructure, maintenance, land use, emissions to air, water consumption and treatment of sewage.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
